Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

OOC: I apologize if it seems like I am flooding the group with OOC's. I jus=
t had to get my point across.

My mails replying to Cardhead were giving hi=
m a  taste of his own medicine.

My posts replying to Dewboy was complainin=
g that right and complaining about him trying to pin his religion on me.

A=
nd overall I think NBW has unfortunately turned into a mere shadow of the g=
reat RPG it once was.

I just now come to realize that if I'm not welcome h=
ere, I'll gladly leave. I've been up and down that lonely road of faith. DB=
ZSF for me means that my RPGing skills are never wasted.

There was a time =
when all of my characters were serious. They all had very deep personalitie=
s. But those days are long gone, it appears, thanks to the character limit.=
 The character limit of 5 prevents me from being able to do what I do best,=
 right. Yeah, I know my stables were bad, but some great individual charact=
ers came out of it sometimes, correct? My unwillingness to return to my pas=
t are because it feels to me NBW is just no more fun. I have really tried t=
o post. I wanted to help it. But apparently the new guy thinks he's a more =
valuable player than me. It's no wonder the RPG is dying. Look here. New gu=
y comes in and posts and Cardhead will attack him and run him off. You can =
look forward to that in the future.

I hope you all enjoyed my explanation =
mail.

The world is ******...
------=_NextPart_000_00B9_01C23D6A.4F7E4C20
